Text: July to end of month Cc Ryan we would like to purchase GJ in total from ECC to the end of the month starting July this translates into GJs a day This will be used to balance the rate accounts As we did with last month the balance should be included in the amount included as the exchange amount to and Daily Days Total ACCT Rate ATCO N ACCT Rate ATCO S Can you confirm when this deal has been executed If you have any questions please give me a call Randel Dalgleish Fax

Pricing for sale of GJs Cc PST John my understanding of our deal with you to sell GJs of gas to you each day until the end of June was at the AECO daily price with no discount The Schedule A for Sitara shows a discount of per GJ If this should be can you let me and Lisa McIsaac know so the contract can be changed if not can you contact Kate or myself when you have a break in trading or after trading has closed for the day Thanks Randel Dalgleish Fax

Exchange rest of month for rate Cc PST John as per your discussion with Kate here are the GJs that we will sell to you each day from June to June as part of the balancing of Enron Directs rate accounts with ATCO As I understand this will be sold at AECO daily index with no fees attached and will be exchanged with ECC rather than transfer from our account The following is the GJs that need to be exchanged sold Daily Vol of Days Total Account Rate ACTO North Account Rate ACTO South Total Can I get a confirmation that deal was executed If there are any questions please give me a call Ill call Coreen to discuss how to change the nomination with Mel Thanks Randel Dalgleish Fax
